sentences: Minu isa on siin, kuna tuleb töölt.
Kui saabate sealt töölt, palun hoestage oma kingituse ette.
context: 'töölt' is the elative form of 'töö', meaning 'work'. It translates to 'from work' or 'at work' depending on context. Commonly used in sentences to indicate someone coming from work, being at work, or something related to leaving/arriving from a workplace.
